name: Scorpion Helicopter Robot Game
description:
Get ready for the amazing Scorpion Robot Car transformation into Helicopter, robot, and Deadly Scorpion. The ultimate mech robot fight is a new era of robot wars.




Features:
- Multiple modes with multiple levels.
- Deadly FIght Between Helicopters and animal-like Mech Scorpion.
- Different robots with multiple transform options.
- Robot to Deadly Scorpion Transformation.
- Robot to car conversion.
- Robot to Helicopter Transformation.
